answers.answer: Your blood sugar might be low or it could be something else they found if you said they did blood work.
If you fail the 3 hour,  they will diagnose you with gestational diabetes.  Not a big deal.  A lot of pregnant women have it. The diabetes usually goes away after you have baby.
Does it make me a high risk pregnancy? I just want my baby to be okay... Its y first.

question: So Friday was my first appointment... I'm only 8 weeks. They did lab work on everything for me including a glucose test. They didn't have me fast tho...they gave me an orange drink and waited an hour then took my blood. Today I get a call saying my doctor needs me to fast after dinner then go to the lab early in the morning and do a 3 hour test but I could be there for 4 hours... I'm so scared. Does that mean they found something wrong???
title: asap glucose test!!! im so scared!
